title: Gopal's Creperie - Food Trailer
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Fast food, Take-out only
description: Food wagon offering both sweet and savory gluten-free and crepes with fillings that are either vegetarian and vegan. Cheese could be omitted by request or substituted for something else. Uses honey. Sit on the North end of Kapa'a where the coastal bike path runs alongside and is steps away from the beach.
